verses.verse: וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> vay-Hi had been אֲרוֹן־ <WH727> 'a-ron- And the ark יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בִּשְׂדֵ֥ה <WH7704> bis-Deh was in the country פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim of the Philistines שִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah seven חֳדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH2320> cho-da-Shim. months

וַיִּקְרְא֣וּ <WH7121> vai-yik-re-'U called פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim, And the Philistines לַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <WH3548> lak-ko-ha-Nim for the priests וְלַקֹּֽסְמִים֙ <WH7080> ve-lak-ko-se-Mim and the diviners לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying מַֽה־ <WH4100> mah- What נַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> na-'a-Seh What shall we do לַאֲר֣וֹן <WH727> la-'a-Ron to the ark יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; Jehovah הוֹדִעֻ֕נוּ <WH3045> ho-di-'U-nu acknowledge בַּמֶּ֖ה <WH4100> bam-Meh how נְשַׁלְּחֶ֥נּוּ <WH7971> ne-shal-le-Chen-nu us wherewith we shall send לִמְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> lim-ko-Mo. it to his place

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru, And they said אִֽם־ <WH518> 'im- If מְשַׁלְּחִ֞ים <WH7971> me-shal-le-Chim If ye send away אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲר֨וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay תְּשַׁלְּח֤וּ <WH7971> te-shal-le-Chu send אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To רֵיקָ֔ם <WH7387> rei-Kam, it not empty כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הָשֵׁ֥ב <WH7725> ha-Shev but in any wise תָּשִׁ֛יבוּ <WH7725> ta-Shi-vu return ל֖וֹ lo אָשָׁ֑ם <WH817> 'a-Sham; him a trespass offering אָ֤ז <WH227> 'az Then תֵּרָֽפְאוּ֙ <WH7495> te-ra-fe-'U then ye shall be healed וְנוֹדַ֣ע <WH3045> ve-no-Da' and it shall be known לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, לָ֛מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah why לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- is not תָס֥וּר <WH5493> ta-Sur is not removed יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do to you why his hand מִכֶּֽם׃ <WH4480> mik-Kem. they

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru, Then said מָ֣ה <WH4100> mah What הָאָשָׁם֮ <WH817> ha-'a-Sham they What [shall be] the trespass offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> na-Shiv which we shall return לוֹ֒ lo וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru, to him;They answered מִסְפַּר֙ <WH4557> mis-Par [according to] the number סַרְנֵ֣י <WH5633> sar-Nei of the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines חֲמִשָּׁה֙ <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah Five; עָפְלֵי 'a-fe-lei כטְחֹרֵ֣י <WH6076> te-cho-Rei stronghold קזָהָ֔ב <WH2091> za-Hav, golden וַחֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <WH2568> va-cha-mish-Shah and five עַכְבְּרֵ֣י <WH5909> 'ach-be-Rei mice זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> za-Hav; golden כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for מַגֵּפָ֥ה <WH4046> mag-ge-Fah plague אַחַ֛ת <WH259> 'a-Chat for one לְכֻלָּ֖ם <WH3605> le-chul-Lam all וּלְסַרְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5633> u-le-sar-nei-Chem. [was] on you all and on your lords

וַעֲשִׂיתֶם֩ <WH6213> va-'a-si-Tem Wherefore ye shall make צַלְמֵ֨י <WH6754> tzal-Mei images; עָפְלֵיכֶם 'a-fe-lei-chem כטְחֹרֵיכֶ֜ם <WH6076> te-cho-rei-Chem stronghold קוְצַלְמֵ֣י <WH6754> ve-tzal-Mei and images עַכְבְּרֵיכֶ֗ם <WH5909> 'ach-be-rei-Chem, of your mice הַמַּשְׁחִיתִם֙ <WH7843> ham-mash-chi-Tim that mar אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, the land וּנְתַתֶּ֛ם <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Tem and ye shall give לֵאלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> le-lo-Hei unto the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel כָּב֑וֹד <WH3519> ka-Vod; glory אוּלַ֗י <WH194> 'u-Lai, perhaps יָקֵ֤ל <WH7043> ya-Kel peradventure he will lighten אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand מֵֽעֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> me-'a-lei-Chem, and וּמֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> u-me-'Al and אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem from off you and from off your gods וּמֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> u-me-'Al and אַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <WH776> 'ar-tze-Chem. and from off your land

וְלָ֤מָּה <WH4100> ve-Lam-mah Why תְכַבְּדוּ֙ <WH3513> te-chab-be-Du Wherefore then do ye harden אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- לְבַבְכֶ֔ם <WH3824> le-vav-Chem, your hearts כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after כִּבְּד֛וּ <WH3513> kib-be-Du hardened מִצְרַ֥יִם <WH4713> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian וּפַרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> u-far-'Oh and Pharaoh אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- לִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> lib-Bam; care for הֲלוֹא֙ <WH3808> ha-lO not כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher he הִתְעַלֵּ֣ל <WH5953> hit-'al-Lel had severely בָּהֶ֔ם ba-Hem, וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֖וּם <WH7971> vay-shal-le-Chum among them did they not let the people go וַיֵּלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> vai-ye-Le-chu. along

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, Now קְח֨וּ <WH3947> ke-Chu and take וַעֲשׂ֜וּ <WH6213> va-'a-Su Now therefore make עֲגָלָ֤ה <WH5699> 'a-ga-Lah cart חֲדָשָׁה֙ <WH2319> cha-da-Shah new אֶחָ֔ת <WH259> 'e-Chat, a וּשְׁתֵּ֤י <WH8147> u-she-Tei two פָרוֹת֙ <WH6510> fa-rOt kine עָל֔וֹת <WH5763> a-Lot, milch אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- has never עָלָ֥ה <WH5927> 'a-Lah on which there hath come עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem and עֹ֑ל <WH5923> 'Ol; no yoke וַאֲסַרְתֶּ֤ם <WH631> va-'a-sar-Tem and tie אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַפָּרוֹת֙ <WH6510> hap-pa-rOt the kine בָּעֲגָלָ֔ה <WH5699> ba-'a-ga-Lah, to the cart וַהֲשֵׁיבֹתֶ֧ם <WH7725> va-ha-shei-vo-Tem and bring בְּנֵיהֶ֛ם <WH1121> be-nei-Hem their calves מֵאַחֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH310> me-'a-cha-rei-Hem from them הַבָּֽיְתָה׃ <WH1004> hab-Ba-ye-tah. home

וּלְקַחְתֶּ֞ם <WH3947> u-le-kach-Tem And take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וּנְתַתֶּ֤ם <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Tem and lay אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- on הָ֣עֲגָלָ֔ה <WH5699> ha-'a-ga-Lah, it upon the cart וְאֵ֣ת׀ <WH853> ve-'Et כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> ke-Lei the jewels הַזָּהָ֗ב <WH2091> haz-za-Hav, of gold אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הֲשֵׁבֹתֶ֥ם <WH7725> ha-she-vo-Tem which ye return לוֹ֙ lo אָשָׁ֔ם <WH817> 'a-Sham, him [for] a trespass offering תָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> ta-Si-mu and put בָאַרְגַּ֖ז <WH712> va-'ar-Gaz in a coffer מִצִּדּ֑וֹ <WH6654> mitz-tzid-Do; by the side וְשִׁלַּחְתֶּ֥ם <WH7971> ve-shil-lach-Tem thereof and send it away אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To וְהָלָֽךְ׃ <WH1980> ve-ha-Lach. that it may go

וּרְאִיתֶ֗ם <WH7200> u-re-'i-Tem, And see אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if דֶּ֨רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech by the way גְּבוּל֤וֹ <WH1366> ge-vu-Lo of his own coast יַֽעֲלֶה֙ <WH5927> ya-'a-Leh if it goeth up בֵּ֣ית beit שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH1053> She-mesh, to Bethshemesh ה֚וּא <WH1931> hu He עָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> 'A-sah [then] he hath done לָ֔נוּ La-nu, אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָרָעָ֥ה <WH7451> ha-ra-'Ah evil הַגְּדוֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> hag-ge-do-Lah us this great הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> haz-Zot; But וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if לֹ֗א <WH3808> Lo, not וְיָדַ֙עְנוּ֙ <WH3045> ve-ya-Da'-nu but if not then we shall know כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo not יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> ya-Do that [it is] not his hand נָ֣גְעָה <WH5060> Na-ge-'ah [that] smote בָּ֔נוּ Ba-nu, מִקְרֶ֥ה <WH4745> mik-Reh us it [was] a chance ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu it הָ֥יָה <WH1961> Ha-yah [that] happened to us לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

וַיַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Su did so הָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim the men כֵּ֔ן <WH3651> Ken, so וַיִּקְח֗וּ <WH3947> vai-yik-Chu, and took שְׁתֵּ֤י <WH8147> she-Tei two פָרוֹת֙ <WH6510> fa-rOt kine עָל֔וֹת <WH5763> a-Lot, milch וַיַּאַסְר֖וּם <WH631> vai-ya-'as-Rum and tied בָּעֲגָלָ֑ה <WH5699> ba-'a-ga-Lah; them to the cart וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> be-nei-Hem their calves כָּל֥וּ <WH3607> ka-Lu and shut up בַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> vab-Ba-yit. at home

וַיִשַּׁ֨רְנָה <WH3474> va-yish-Shar-nah took the straight הַפָּר֜וֹת <WH6510> hap-pa-Rot And the kine בַּדֶּ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> bad-De-rech, way עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in דֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> de-rech to the way בֵּ֣ית beit שֶׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH1053> She-mesh, of Bethshemesh בִּמְסִלָּ֣ה <WH4546> bim-sil-Lah the highway אַחַ֗ת <WH259> 'a-Chat, they הָלְכ֤וּ <WH1980> ha-le-Chu [and] went along הָלֹךְ֙ <WH1980> ha-loCh as they went וְגָע֔וֹ <WH1600> ve-ga-'O, lowing וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- and did not סָ֖רוּ <WH5493> Sa-ru and turned not aside יָמִ֣ין <WH3225> ya-Min [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹ֑אול <WH8040> u-se-Mol; or [to] the left וְסַרְנֵ֤י <WH5633> ve-sar-Nei and the lords פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim of the Philistines הֹלְכִ֣ים <WH1980> ho-le-Chim went אַחֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem, after עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- them גְּב֖וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul them unto the border בֵּ֥ית beit שָֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH1053> Sha-mesh. of Bethshemesh

וְהָעֲגָלָ֡ה <WH5699> ve-ha-'a-ga-Lah And the cart בָּ֠אָה <WH935> Ba-'ah came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into שְׂדֵ֨ה <WH7704> se-Deh into the field יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <WH3091> ye-ho-Shu-a' of Joshua בֵּֽית־ beit- הַשִּׁמְשִׁי֙ <WH1030> hash-shim-Shi a Bethshemite וַתַּעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> vat-ta-'a-Mod and stood שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, there וְשָׁ֖ם <WH8033> ve-Sham where אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> 'E-ven stone גְּדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> ge-do-Lah; there where [there was] a great וַֽיְבַקְּעוּ֙ <WH1234> vay-vak-ke-'U and they clave אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> 'a-Tzei the wood הָעֲגָלָ֔ה <WH5699> ha-'a-ga-Lah, of the cart וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַ֨פָּר֔וֹת <WH6510> hap-pa-Rot, the kine הֶעֱל֥וּ <WH5927> he-'e-Lu and offered עֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> 'o-Lah a burnt offering לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. unto the LORD ס sa-Mek

וְהַלְוִיִּ֞ם <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim And the Levites הוֹרִ֣ידוּ׀ <WH3381> ho-Ri-du took down אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָאַרְגַּ֤ז <WH712> ha-'ar-Gaz and the coffer אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which אִתּוֹ֙ <WH854> it-To in אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which בּ֣וֹ bo כְלֵֽי־ <WH3627> che-lei- that [was] with it wherein the jewels זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> za-Hav, of gold וַיָּשִׂ֖מוּ <WH7760> vai-ya-Si-mu [were] and put אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הָאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> ha-'E-ven stone הַגְּדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> hag-ge-do-Lah; [them] on the great וְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> ve-'an-Shei and the men בֵֽית־ veit- שֶׁ֗מֶשׁ <WH1053> She-mesh, of Bethshemesh הֶעֱל֨וּ <WH5927> he-'e-Lu offered עֹל֜וֹת <WH5930> o-Lot burnt offerings וַֽיִּזְבְּח֧וּ <WH2076> vai-yiz-be-Chu and sacrificed זְבָחִ֛ים <WH2077> ze-va-Chim sacrifices בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom the same day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu he לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. unto the LORD
